##Data Processing
```{r download_data}

library(dplyr)
#download data if not already downloaded
if(!file.exists("FStormData.csv.bz2")){
  url<-"http://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2"
  download.file(url, dest="FStormData.csv.bz2", mode="wb") 
}

rawData <- mutate_each(read.csv("FStormData.csv.bz2"), funs(toupper))

#rawData<-read.csv("FStormData.csv.bz2") 
saveRDS(rawData,"data/raw_data.rds")
summary(rawData)


```
